instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3476 - works but doesnt charge, blinks once green light on MG port
threads.message:
MG port voltage 16.6V

plugged in starts fluctuating between 2 and 12V

PPBUS_G3H - 0.25V

Please advice how to proceed. Thanks!

threads.title: 820-3476 - works but doesnt charge, blinks once green light on MG port
threads.message:
"PPBUS_G3H - 0.25V"
How does this board work then???

Please post accurate information.
Specify when you measure with charger alone, or battery alone; as when charger only connected.

threads.title: 820-3476 - works but doesnt charge, blinks once green light on MG port
threads.message:
Sorry for confusion.

When battery is connected the Machine works but doesn't charge.

With charger only i get this:

MG port voltage 16.6V unplugged

plugged - starts fluctuating between 2 and 12V

PPBUS_G3H - 0.25V

threads.title: 820-3476 - works but doesnt charge, blinks once green light on MG port
threads.message:
"MG port voltage 16.6V unplugged

plugged - starts fluctuating between 2 and 12V"
Not very clear this...
Unplugged what?
Do you get 16V without charger???

Possibly leakage on input stage.
Check D7010 and post exact ohm value for R7012; measured onboard.
If good, change Q7180.

threads.title: 820-3476 - works but doesnt charge, blinks once green light on MG port
threads.message:
D7010 looks good.
R7012 shows 68K Ohms
Replaced Q7180 and voila, it works again!
Thanks for your help!
